tool_description:
The Plants API made by Pizza API boasts a database of over 40,000 plants that can be easily searched by either their common name or scientific name. Each plant entry in the API includes a comprehensive list of properties, such as genus, species, category, family, growth habit, duration, and growth rate. 

Some of the most important properties included in the API for each plant entry are mature height, foliage texture, flower color, fruit color, toxicity, drought tolerance, shade tolerance, te...
name: Plants
title: Plants

api_list.name: Search Plant By ID
api_list.description: Gives you information of one particular plant By its ID. Useful when you search for a list of plants and click on one specific plant for more information

api_list.name: Search By Common Name
api_list.description: returns a list of plants by their common name

api_list.name: Search By Scientific Name
api_list.description: You can search with a scientific name of plant and returns the list of plants matches the query
